title: Intro to React
desc: We will dive into React and start from the base, which we tend to then undeerstand 'What is React under the hood ?'. And we will talk about the features of React.

title: React Router & Ajax with React
desc: We will learn how routing works in React, its routing machinism and its best routing technique. We will also learn how we integrate React with a REST end point serving us data.

title: Hackathon
desc: We will summarize what we have learnt, and build some components live. So we can collaborate and learn if anything new comes up. And this holds you points to win a prize

title: Redux
desc: We will understand why we need Redux ?, Redux pattern, When to use Redux ?, Redux with thunk to fetch data from backend and explore a bit about Redux middlewares.

title: Lets hackathon
desc: Final session of the React training, we will summarize everything we have learnt, have Q and A session, have team members talk if they have something interesting they found and finally have our final hackathon
